	Sales and Marketing
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:87.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Alliances
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:87.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Competition
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:87.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Intellectual Property and Other Proprietary Rights
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:87.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Research and Development
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	5

<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:87.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Employees
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;PADDING:0PT;">

	Executive Officers
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:03.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	PART I
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
</FONT>
<A NAME="BVSN-20151231X10K_HTM_PART1ITEM1">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ITEM 1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BUSINESS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Overview and Industry Background
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our Business&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Since 1993, BroadVision has been a pioneer and consistent innovator of e-business solutions. We deliver a combination of technologies and services into the global market that enable customers of all sizes to power mission-critical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	e-business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	initiatives that ultimately deliver high-value to their bottom line. Our offering consists of a robust framework for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	secure, mobile and cloud-based collaboration, information sharing, and knowledge management, which enables our customers to deploy enterprise-class employee and customer engagement, knowledge management, and e-commerce solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Corporate Information&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We were incorporated in Delaware in 1993 and have been a publicly traded corporation since 1996. From 2001 to date, our annual revenue has declined and as of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, we had an accumulated deficit of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1.2&nbsp;billion. The maj
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ority of our accumulated deficit to date has resulted from non-cash charges associated with our 2000 acquisition of Interleaf, Inc. and restructuring charges related to excess real estate lease obligations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The accompanying consolidated financial statements and related financial information contained herein for all periods presented have been retroactively restated to give effect to the stock split in accordance with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles ("U.S. GAAP").
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Our principal executive offices are located at 1700 Seaport Boulevard, Suite 210, Redwood City, CA 94063. Our telephone number is (650)&nbsp;331-1000. Our website address is www.broadvision.com. We make available free of charge through our website our annual report on Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K, and all amendments to these reports as soon as reasonably practicable after filing, by providing a hyperlink to the Securities and Exchange Commission's website (www.sec.gov) directly to our reports. The contents of our website are not incorporated by reference into this report.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Industry Background
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	E-business has become an integral part of work life and organizations are looking for ways to reduce costs, improve productivity and increase revenues by moving their business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	onto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	mobile and cloud platforms. By providing a way to quickly assemble and engage employees and customers via mobile and cloud-based solutions organizations can deliver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	better
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	engagement experience
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	to get more done with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	fewer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	resources.&nbsp;&nbsp;A significant number of industry analysts have highlighted the ways in which organizations can reduce costs and improve customer satisfaction by implementing mobile and cloud solutions which can leverage key resource
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	anytime and from anywhere. In addition to accelerating the response time to customers, e-business engagement applications also enable organizations to deliver higher quality services through more effective collaboration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	among
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	providers of product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Building on the solid foundation of Broad
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	V
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ision&#x2019;s personalization and transaction management capabilities, Broad
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	V
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ision has introduced the Clearvale family of Enterprise Social Networking solutions to include engagement of partners, suppliers and customers through mobile and social technologies in order to meet our customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2019; needs.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In January 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, BroadVision launched Vmoso, a mobile collaboration tool
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	meeting industry standards of security
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	help
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	enterprises safe guard and leverage corporate knowledge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	to increase productivity in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	internal and customer facing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software Products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our primary product offerings are software solutions. We also offer a toolkit, framework and library for extending our solutions. Our offerings have the following characteristics and advantages:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;CELLSPACING:0;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Track record
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;--&nbsp;Experience from over 1,000 implementations and over 20 years of experience.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Agility, extensibility and configurability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;--&nbsp;Integrated tools for rapidly creating e-business applications with modular out-of-the-box capabilities and custom development.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&#xFEFF;

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Business Agility Suite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;is&nbsp;a portal that provides personalized views of information and processes from diverse internal, external and legacy sources.&nbsp;&nbsp;It supports collaboration both inside and outside the enterprise.&nbsp;&nbsp;It manages web content throughout its lifecycle: creation, review, approval, version control, deployment, distribution and audit trail.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Commerce Agility Suite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;is our e-commerce system for transacting business on the web, from lead generation, navigation, category management, incentive, shopping cart, order execution, to customer care.&nbsp;&nbsp;It supports both Business-to-Business (B2B) and Business-to-Consumer (B2C) commerce.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, it has the full capabilities of our Business Agility Suite.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is our enterprise social network solution, aimed at revolutionizing enterprise knowledge flows.&nbsp; Beyond individual social networks, it organizes multiple social networks into ecosystems, and manages them coherently.&nbsp;&nbsp;It has three variations.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale Express
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is free, for entry-level capabilities;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale Enterprise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is for full capabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;We operate these two variations as SaaS over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	loud.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The third variation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale PaasPort
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is a platform for partners who want to resell our enterprise social network solution.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clear,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	formerly named CHRM, is a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ollaborative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	uman
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	esources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	anagement system.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is a Portal-based human resources management system solution developed by our subsidiary BroadVision OnDemand, headquartered in Beijing, China, using our Kukini toolkit and Kona framework.&nbsp;&nbsp;It facilitates collaboration by members of a customer&#x2019;s organization in each phase of the HR management life cycle.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	QuickSilver&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is a high-end publishing system for large and complex documents.&nbsp;&nbsp;Some typical uses are aircraft manuals, weapon system manuals and massive customizable insurance policies.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It supports multiple output formats, such as HTML, PDF and Postscript.&nbsp;&nbsp;It also includes a complete XML authoring environment.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:52.65PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:52.65PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;HEIGHT:52.65PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Vmoso
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is a cloud application for conducting virtual enterprise communication, mobile workgroup collaboration, and social business engagement. It unifies five workplace activities in one platform: email, instant messaging, content sharing, workflow, and social networking. It empowers users and their extended organizations to communicate and collaborate whenever, wherever and on whatever device they choose; allowing for greater productivity in less time and at lower cost
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.94%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.28%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Vmoso Developer Kit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Vmoso Developer Kit allows developers to easily leverage Vmoso&#x2019;s open APIs to create rich interfaces, plugins and extensions to the Vmoso mobile communication and collaboration application.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Developer Toolkit: Kukini
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Kukini is a visual workbench for designing, implementing and deploying e-business applications rapidly.&nbsp;&nbsp;It facilitates effective collaboration of people with different skills.&nbsp;&nbsp;Its resulting applications run with a customer's J2EE application environment of choice, and leverage our Kona framework and services library.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Framework: Kona
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Kona is the common J2EE-based infrastructure underlying our Business Agility Suite, Commerce Agility Suite and Clear solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;It provides a standard-based and portable environment across many operating systems, application servers and databases.&nbsp;&nbsp;It comes with rich APIs, schemas and utilities needed for building scalable and robust e-business applications.&nbsp;&nbsp;It allows modular services to be easily added and configured, for extension and integration with other systems.&nbsp;&nbsp;We often refer to Kukini and Kona together as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Library of Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	These services are modular building blocks that extend the capabilities of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	various
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	framework
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Some of the services are pre-packaged into our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	applications and platforms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
</P>

</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:90.04%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:24.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	Unified Stream Services&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	for&nbsp;unification and integration of information from various sources presented in time and sort preferences
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We provide a full spectrum of global consulting services to customers to reali
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	z
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	e the value from their investment in BroadVision&#x2019;s solutions. This includes: business consulting; implementation services; integration and package services; upgrade and migration services; and performance tuning. In addition we also enable our partners so that they can offer these services to their end customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Vmoso Enterprise Transformation (VET)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Vmoso Enterprise Transformation, or VET, is a proprietary implementation approach for the Vmoso collaborative solution. When you enroll in VET, our BroadVision Global Services representative will take you through a process of planning, establishing and refining your communication, collaboration and engagement practices. This is an iterative process to instill new habits and ways of working that supports the way you are currently working&#x2014;it&#x2019;s gradual transformation, not a dramatic shift.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	lead to an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	empowered and organized workforce, engaged and delighted customers, and a productive organization with an improved bottom line.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Education Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BroadVision offers a comprehensive range of in-depth, focused training courses and self-study materials for both customers and partners to develop the knowledge they need to properly install, implement, and fully leverage the features of BroadVision&#x2019;s solutions. Backed up by train-the-trainer programs for in-house deployment and online testing to validate training effectiveness.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Support and Maintenance Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We offer a tiered support and maintenance program to better serve the needs of our global customer base. Standard Support provides technical assistance during regular business hours; Enterprise Support is designed for customers with mission-critical environments, providing customers with access to support experts 24&nbsp;hours a day, 7&nbsp;days a week; and Personalized Support assigns a specific individual to a customer along with other customer specified support services, including on-site support engineers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We have technical support centers in North America, Europe and Asia. Under our standard maintenance agreement, we provide telephone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	support and upgrade rights to new releases, including patch releases (as necessary) and product enhancements (when and if available).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Customers
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, no customer accounted for more than 10% of our total revenues.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	government entity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	accounted for more than 10% of our total revenues. We do not believe that the loss of any single customer would have a material adverse effect on our business or results of operations.
</FONT>
</P>

	Sales and Marketing

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>

	We have sales offices located throughout the world to support the sales and marketing of our products. In support of the Americas organizations, offices located in the United States are in California and Massachusetts.&nbsp;&nbsp;Offices for our Europe region are located in Italy.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our sales and marketing offices in the Asia Pacific/Japan/India region are located in India, China, Taiwan, and Japan.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We derive a significant portion of our revenue from our operations outside North America. In the twelve months ended December&nbsp;31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	59
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	% of our revenues were derived from international sales. In the twelve months ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	55
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	% of our revenue was derived from international sales. If we are unable to manage or grow our existing international operations, we may not generate sufficient revenue required to establish and maintain these operations, which could slow our overall growth and impair our operating margins.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Initial sales activities typically involve discussion and review of the potential business value associated with the implementation of a BroadVision solution, a demonstration of our applications capabilities online or at the prospect's site, followed by one or more detailed technical reviews. The sales process usually involves collaboration with the prospective customer in order to specify the scope of the solution. Our Global Services Organization helps customers to customize, develop and deploy their e-business solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As of December&nbsp;31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	we had 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	employees engaged in a variety of marketing activities, including product planning, marketing material development, public relations, identifying potential customers, establishing and maintaining close relationships with recognized industry analysts and maintaining our website.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	Alliances

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We recognize that today's organizations require an open, partner-based approach to e-business. Accordingly, we have assembled a global team of partners with the skills, services and value-added products necessary to develop, market, sell and deliver competitive e-business solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	In late 2010 we introduced Clearvale PaasPort, a channel program that enables partners to resell, customize and add value to our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale Enterprise Social Networking solutions.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Consulting Partners
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our systems integration and consulting services partners deliver strategic business solutions to our global customers. These partners offer deployment experience, strong vertical market expertise, and process-based solutions. We structure our contractual arrangements with these consulting partners to motivate them to develop an expertise in our technology and sell our products and services to potential customers, thus enabling us to extend the reach of our products and services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Technology/OEM Partners
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our technology partners include Value-Added Resellers (VAR) and Independent Software Vendors (ISV) who build and deploy BroadVision-based vertical and horizontal software solutions. Revenue generated from technology/OEM partners in recent years has not been significant.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Competition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	If we fail to compete successfully with current or future competitors, we may lose market share. The market for e-business is intensely competitive. Our customers' requirements and the technology available to satisfy those requirements will continually change. We expect competition in this market to intensify. Our primary competition currently includes:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Compared to us, many of these competitors and other current and future competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	have longer operating histories and significantly greater financial, technical, sales, marketing and other resources. As a result, they may be able to respond more quickly to new or changing opportunities, technologies and customer requirements. Many of these companies can use their greater name recognition and more extensive customer base to gain market share. Competitors may be able to undertake more extensive promotional activities, adopt more aggressive pricing policies and offer more attractive terms to purchasers. Current and potential competitors may bundle their products to discourage users from purchasing our products. In addition, competitors have established or may establish cooperative relationships among themselves or with third parties to enhance their products. Accordingly, it is possible that new competitors or alliances among competitors may emerge and rapidly acquire significant market share. Competitive pressures may make it difficult for us to acquire and retain customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Intellectual Property and Other Proprietary Rights
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our success and ability to compete are dependent to a significant degree on our proprietary technology.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We hold a U.S. patent, issued January 28, 2014, on the unique concepts and features in our online solution that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	allows subscribers to connect with other people and share tasks and content.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We also hold a patent issued in 2004 on mechanisms for translating between a word processing document and an XML file.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Although we hold these patents, they may not provide an adequate level of intellectual property protection. In addition, litigation may be necessary in the future to enforce our intellectual property rights, to protect our trade secrets, to determine the validity and scope of the proprietary rights of others, or to defend against claims of infringement or invalidity. We cannot guarantee that infringement or other claims will not be asserted or prosecuted against us in the future, whether resulting from our intellectual property or licenses from third parties. Claims or litigation, whether successful or unsuccessful, could result in substantial costs and diversions of resources, either of which could harm our business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We also rely on copyright, trademark, service mark, trade secret laws and contractual restrictions to protect our proprietary rights in products and services. We have registered "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BroadVision", "Clearvale"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, the Clearvale logo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	"Interleaf" as trademarks in the United States and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	/or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	in other countries. It is possible that our competitors or other companies will adopt product names similar to these trademarks, impeding our ability to build brand identity and possibly confusing customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As a matter of our company policy, we enter into confidentiality and assignment agreements with our employees, consultants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, partners
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and vendors. We also control access to and distribution of our software, documents and other proprietary information. Notwithstanding these precautions, it may be possible for an unauthorized third party to copy or otherwise obtain and use our software or other proprietary information or to develop similar software independently. Policing unauthorized use of our products will be difficult, particularly because the global nature of the Internet makes it difficult to control the ultimate destination or security of software and other transmitted data. The laws of other countries may afford us little or no effective protection of our intellectual property.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Research and Development
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	e had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	employees dedicated to research and development. Our research and development expenses consist primarily of salaries, employee-related benefit costs and consulting fees incurred in association with the development of our products. Research and development expenses are expensed as incurred. Our fut
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ure success depends, in part, upon our ability to develop new products and new versions of our products with new and expanded features. We believe that continued investment in our technology is important for our future growth, and as a result, we expect to incur material research and development expenses for the foreseeable future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;

</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Research and development expenses were $

	2015
</FONT>

	million for the year ended December 31,
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</P>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We believe that our future success depends on attracting and retaining highly skilled personnel. We may be unable to attract and retain high-caliber employees. Our employees are not represented by any collective bargaining unit. We have never experienced a work stoppage and consider our employee relations to be good.
</FONT>
