<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the stock market has experienced significant price and volume fluctuations that have particularly affected the trading prices of equity securities of many technology companies. These fluctuations have often been unrelated or disproportionate to the operating performance of these companies. Any negative change in the public's perception of the prospects of Internet, enterprise social networking or electronic commerce companies could further depress our stock price regardless of our results. Other broad market fluctuations may decrease the trading price of BroadVision common stock. In the past, following declines in the market price of a company's securities, securities class action litigation has often been instituted against that company. Litigation could result in substantial costs and a diversion of management's attention and resources.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_RISK_FACTORS>

<EFX_MARKET>
<A NAME="FIS_MARKET"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<A NAME="BVSN-20151231X10K_HTM_PART2ITEM5">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ITEM 5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	MARKET FOR REGISTRANT'S COMMON EQUITY, RELATED STOCKHOLDER MATTERS AND ISSUER PURCHASES OF EQUITY SECURITIES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Until our delisting on March 8, 2006, our common stock had been quoted on the NASDAQ National Market. From March 8, 2006 to May 24, 2007, our common stock was quoted on the Pink Sheets&#xAE;. From May 25, 2007 to October 24, 2008, our common stock was trading on the OTC Bulletin Board. Effective as of the open of trading on October 27, 2008, we effected a one-for-twenty-five reverse split of our common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective as of November 10, 2008, we have transferred the quotation of our common stock from the OTC Bulletin Board to the NASDAQ Global Market under the trading symbol "BVSN".&nbsp;&nbsp;The following table shows high and low sale prices per share of our common stock as reported on&nbsp;the NASDAQ Global Market:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

	None.
</FONT>
</P>

</EFX_MARKET>
<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<A NAME="BVSN-20151231X10K_HTM_PART2ITEM7">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ITEM 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	You should read this discussion and analysis in conjunction with our Consolidated Financial Statements and the related Notes appearing elsewhere in this report. In addition to the historical consolidated information, the following discussion contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of Section&nbsp;27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and within the meaning of Section&nbsp;21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, which are subject to the "safe harbor" created by those sections. These forward-looking statements are generally identified by words such as "expect", "anticipate", "intend", "believe", "hope", "assume", "estimate", "plan", "will" and other similar words and expressions. These forward-looking statements involve risks and uncertainties that could cause our actual results to differ materially from those expressed or implied in the forward-looking statements as a result of certain factors. Factors that could cause or contribute to differences include those discussed below and elsewhere in this Form&nbsp;10-K, particularly in Item 1A, "Risk Factors." We undertake no obligation to publicly release any revisions to the forward-looking statements or to reflect events and circumstances after the date of this document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 9PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Since 1993, BroadVision has been a pioneer and consistent innovator of e-business solutions. We deliver a combination of technologies and services into the global market that enable customers of all sizes to power mission-critical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	web
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, cloud and mobile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage18"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	initiatives that ultimately deliver high-value to their bottom line. Our offering consists of a robust framework for personalization and self-service, modular applications and agile toolsets that customers use to create e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	-commerce, portal solutions, Enterprise Social Networks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(ESN)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and collaboration and knowledge management solutions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Most recently, we have added mobile and cloud capabilities to our platforms to enable our customers for rapid deployment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	robust, secure, and scalable solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:9PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our objective is to further our position as a global supplier of innovative e-business solutions with the addition of enterprise collaboration and engagement solutions such as our mobile and cloud-based Vmoso, a collaboration and knowledge management product, and Clearvale, an ESN product.&nbsp;&nbsp;Together with our legacy Business Agility Suite, Commerce Agility Suite and QuickSilver solutions,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	new enterprise collaboration and engagement solutions will enhance the communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	collaboration and knowledge management capabilities of organizations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	their customers, partners and employees to improve productivity and efficiency.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We generate revenue from fees for licenses of our software products and related maintenance, consulting services and customer training. We generally charge fees for licenses of our software products based on (1) the number of persons registered to use the product; (2) the number of CPUs utilized by the machines on which the product is installed; or (3) usage of Cloud or SaaS. Payment terms are generally 30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	to 60
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	days from the date the software products are delivered, the maintenance or subscription contracts are booked, or the consulting services are provided.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We generated net income in years 2007 and 2009
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	; and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	net loss in years 2008, 2010
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, 2011
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, 2012
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Our ability to generate profits or positive cash flows in future periods remains uncertain.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our operations in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	faced t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	wo challenges: maturity of our major revenue-generating legacy products, and competing in a crowded ESN solution space.&nbsp;&nbsp;We continued to invest heavily in cloud-based, mobile, messaging and collaboration technologies, while continuing to support our legacy base.&nbsp;&nbsp;Total 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	revenues of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million were lower compared to total
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	revenues of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.6 million, with the decrease mainly in legacy revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We will continue to diligently invest in new technologies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	in an effort t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	o &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	maintain our competitive advantages in the mobile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	communications and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	collaboration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and knowledge management
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Obligations to Related Parties
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	On November 14, 2008, BroadVision (Delaware) LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#x201C;BVD&#x201D;), which was then our wholly owned subsidiary, entered into a Share Purchase Agreement with CHRM LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, that is controlled by Dr. Pehong Chen, our CEO and largest stockholder and in which our CFO, Peter Chu holds a minority interest. We and CHRM LLC then entered into an Amended and Restated Operating Agreement of BroadVision (Delaware) LLC dated as of November 14, 2008 (the &#x201C;BVD Operating Agreement&#x201D;). Under these agreements, CHRM LLC received, in exchange for the assignment of certain intellectual property rights,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Class B Shares of BVD, representing the right to receive a portion of any distribution of Funds from &#x201C;Capital Transactions&#x201D; (as such term is defined in the BVD Operating Agreement), with the exact amount to be determined based on our and CHRM LLC&#x2019;s capital account balances at the time of such distribution. A &#x201C;capital transaction&#x201D; under that agreement is any merger or sale of substantially all of the assets of BVD as a result of which the members of BVD will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	nolonger have an interest in BVD or the assets of BVD will be distributed to its members. Class B Shares do not participate in any profits of BVD except for net profits related to a &#x201C;capital transaction,&#x201D; in which case the net profits are allocated to the owners of Class A and Class B Shares in proportion to their respective number of shares. To the extent BVD&#x2019;s losses do not exceed undistributed net profits accumulated since the date of issuance of Class B Shares, such losses are allocated to Class A Shares. To the extent net losses exceed the undistributed net profits accumulated since the date of issuance of Class B Shares, such excess is allocated to the owners of Class A and Class B Shares in proportion to their respective cumulative capital contributions less any return of capital, until allocation of such losses results in having the capital account balances equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	zero. Then, net losses are allocated to the owners of Class A and Class B Shares in proportion to their respective number of shares. Upon liquidation the net assets of BVD are distributed to the owners of Class A and Class B in proportion to their capital account balances.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BVD is the sole owner of BroadVision (Barbados) Limited (&#x201C;BVB&#x201D;) and BVB is the sole owner of BroadVision On Demand, a Chinese entity (&#x201C;BVOD&#x201D;). We have invested approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million in BVOD (directly and through BVD and BVB). In 2014 we began making payments directly to BVOD for certain labor outsourcing services and expect to continue to pay BVOD for such services at the rate of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$400,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	per quarter for the foreseeable future. We have a controlling voting interest in BVD. Pursuant to the terms of the BVD Operating Agreement, the Class B Shares held by CHRM LLC have no voting rights.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The 20 Class B Shares of BVD represent a non-controlling interest. We allocate profits and losses of BVD to the non-controlling interest under the Hypothetical Liquidation Book Value (&#x201C;HLBV&#x201D;) method. Under this method the profits and losses are allocated by reference to the profit sharing provisions in the BVD Operating Agreement assuming liquidation of BVD at its book value at the end of each reporting period. Profits and losses allocated to the balance of such interest under the HLBV method have not been material.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In April
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015, we executed a renewal contract with a third party of which Dr. Pehong Chen, our CEO and largest stockholder, is a board member.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The total renewal license associated with that contract is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$184,000.&nbsp;&nbsp;In 2014, we executed a renewal contract with the
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage19"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	same customer with an associated value of $166,000. We recognized $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	176
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,000 and $164,000 of license revenue for the fiscal year 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	RECENT ACCOUNTING PRONOUNCEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	See Note 1 to the Consolidated Financial Statements for a full description of recent accounting pronouncements, including the expected dates of adoption and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	expected impacts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	results of operations and financial condition, which is incorporated herein by reference.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 9PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Critical Accounting Policies, Judgments and Estimates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This management's discussion and analysis of our financial condition and results of operations is based upon our Consolidated Financial Statements, which have been prepared in accordance with U.S. GAAP. In preparing these financial statements, we are required to make estimates and judgments that affect the reported amounts of assets, liabilities, revenues and expenses, and related disclosures of contingent assets and liabilities. On an ongoing basis, we evaluate our estimates, including those related to receivable reserves, stock-based compensation, investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	income taxes, as well as contingencies and litigation. We base our estimates on historical experience and on various other assumptions that we believe are reasonable, the results of which form the basis for making judgments about the carrying values of assets and liabilities that are not readily apparent from other sources. Actual results may differ from these estimates using different assumptions or conditions. We believe the following critical accounting policies reflect the more significant judgments and estimates used in the preparation of our Consolidated Financial Statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 9PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 9PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our revenue consists of fees for licenses of our software products, maintenance, consulting services and training.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our revenue recognition policies comply with Accounting Standards Codification ASC 985-605,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software: Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and Staff Accounting Bulletin SAB 104,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. In October 2009,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the Financial Accounting Standard Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	FASB
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	amended the accounting standards in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Accounting Standards Update ("ASU") 2009-13 (an update to ASC 605-25) ("ASU 2009-13")
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	for certain multiple deliverable revenue arrangements to: 1) provide updated guidance on whether multiple deliverables exist, how the deliverables in an arrangement should be separated, and how the consideration should be allocated; 2) require an entity to allocate revenue in an arrangement using best estimated selling price ("BESP") of deliverables if a vendor does not have VSOE of selling price or third-party evidence ("TPE") of selling price; and 3) eliminate the use of the residual method and require an entity to allocate revenue using the relative selling price method. We adopted ASU 2009-13 at the beginning of the first quarter of fiscal 2011. The application of these new accounting standards did not have a material impact on total net revenues for fiscal year 2011.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We recognize revenue when all four of the following revenue recognition criteria have been met:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;CELLSPACING:0;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:65.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:65.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Persuasive evidence of an arrangement exists;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:65.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We have delivered the product or performed the service;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:65.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The fee is fixed or determinable; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="CELLSPACING:0;">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:05.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	&#x2022;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:65.00%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Collection is probable.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We qualify the second of the above listed criteria differently for different types of revenues, as follows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software License Revenue, Non-Subscription and Non-Hosted Products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Delivery of non-subscription and non-hosted software products is considered to have occurred when title to the physical media and risk of loss have been transferred to the customer, which generally occurs when media containing the licensed programs is provided to a common carrier. In case of electronic delivery, delivery occurs when the customer is given access to the licensed programs. For products that cannot be used without a licensing key, the delivery requirement is met when the licensing key is made available to the customer.&nbsp;&nbsp;We do not grant a right of return for non-subscription or non-hosted software products.&nbsp;&nbsp;We recognize revenue upon the delivery of our software.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software License Revenue, Subscription Products or Hosted Products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Although we make our software available to the customer at a particular point in time, the delivery of subscription software products (such as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	QuickSilver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) and hosted software products (such as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Vmoso,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clearvale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Clear
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) is considered to have occurred ratably over the duration of the contract.&nbsp;&nbsp;We recognize revenue ratably.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage20"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Services Revenues
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Consulting services revenues and training revenues are recognized as such services are performed.&nbsp;&nbsp;These services are not essential to the functionality of the software. We record reimbursement from our customers for out-of-pocket expenses as an increase to services revenues.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Maintenance revenue, which includes revenue that is derived from software license agreements that entitle the customers to technical support and future unspecified enhancements to our products, is recognized ratably over the related agreement period, which time period is generally twelve months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Receivable Reserves
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Occasionally, our customers experience financial difficulty after we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	recognize
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the sale but before payment has been received. We maintain receivable reserves for estimated losses resulting from the inability of our customers to make required payments. Our normal payment terms are generally 30 to 90&nbsp;days from the invoice date. If the financial condition of our customers were to deteriorate, resulting in their inability to make the contractual payments, additional reserves may be required. Losses from customer receivables in the two-year period ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	have not been significant. If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	all efforts to collect a receivable fail, and the receivable is considered uncollectible, we would write
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	off against the receivable reserve.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Research and Development and Software Development Costs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ASC 985-20,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Costs of Software to be Sold, Leased, or Marketed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	("ASC 985-20"), requires capitalization of certain software development costs subsequent to the establishment of technological feasibility. Based on our product development process, technological feasibility is established upon the completion of a working model. To date, costs incurred by us between the completion of the working model and the point at which the product is ready for general release have been insignificant. Accordingly, we have charged all such costs to research and development expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	in the period incurred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Income Taxes and Deferred Tax Assets
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Income taxes are computed using an asset and liability approach in accordance with ASC 740-10,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Income Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	("ASC 740-10"), which requires the recognition of taxes payable or refundable for the current year and deferred tax assets and liabilities for the future tax consequences of events that have been recognized in our Consolidated Financial Statements or tax returns. The measurement of current and deferred tax assets and liabilities is based on provisions of the enacted tax law; the effects of future changes in tax laws or rates are not anticipated. The measurement of deferred tax assets is reduced, if necessary, by the amount of any tax benefits that, based on available evidence, is not expected to be realized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We analyze our deferred tax assets with regard to potential realization. We have established a valuation allowance on our deferred tax assets to the extent that management has determined that it is more likely than not that some portion or all of the deferred tax asset will not be realized based upon the uncertainty of their realization. We&nbsp;consider the effects of estimated future taxable income, current economic conditions and ongoing prudent and feasible tax planning strategies in assessing the amount of the valuation allowance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 9PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Stock-Based Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We account for share-based payment arrangement in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ASC 718-10,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Compensation &#x2013; Stock Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	("ASC 718-10"), using the modified-prospective transition method. Under ASC 718-10, share-based compensation cost is estimated at the grant date based on the fair value of the award and is recognized as expense, net of estimated pre-vesting forfeitures, ratably over the vesting period of the award.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We adopted the alternative transition method provided in ASC 718-10 for calculating the tax effects of stock-based compensation pursuant to ASC 718-10 in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2006. The alternative transition method includes simplified methods to establish the beginning balance of the additional paid-in capital pool ("APIC pool") related to the tax effects of employee stock-based compensation, and to determine the subsequent impact on the APIC pool and Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows of the tax effects of employee stock-based compensation awards that are outstanding upon adoption of ASC 718-10. The adoption did not have a material impact on our results of operations and financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Further details related to our Stock Benefit Plans and our adoption of ASC 718-10 are provided in Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#x2013; Stockholders' Equity in the Notes to our Consolidated Financial Statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	&nbsp;

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	of Total Revenues
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.10%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:15.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

	c

	loud hosting operation, pro
</FONT>

	duct media, duplication, packaging, and other manufacturing costs as well as royalties payable t
</FONT>

	o third parties for software that is either embedded in, or bundled and sold with, our products.&nbsp;&nbsp;Cost of software licenses for the year ended December&nbsp;31,

	201

	49

	,000 for the year ended December 31,

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Background and Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	At December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, our current assets exceeded our current liabilities by approximately $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	26.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million. Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	management believes that our cash and cash equivalents and short-term investments as of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	will be sufficient to fund operations through at least December&nbsp;31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, we had $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million of cash and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	19.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million of short-term investments, with no long-term debt borrowings.&nbsp;&nbsp;The combined cash and short-term investment balances

	as of

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	declined by $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	million compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	such balances as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This decrease was mainly due to net cash used for operating activities, as described in the Consolidated Statement of Cash Flow during year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We anticipate that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our existing cash and cash equivalents and short-term investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will continue to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	used primarily to fund our operating activities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	ITEM 8. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SUPPLEMENTARY DATA

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The following Consolidated Financial Statements and the related Notes thereto of BroadVision,&nbsp;Inc. and the Report of the Company&#x2019;s Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm are filed as a part of this Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	REPORT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Board of Directors and Stockholders of
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BroadVision, Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We have audited the accompanying consolidated balance sheets of BroadVision, Inc. as of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4 &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and the related consolidated statements of comprehensive loss, stockholders' equity, and cash flows for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	each of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	in the period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;COLOR:#FF00FF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. In connection with our audits of the financial statements, we have also audited the financial statement schedule listed in item 15(a)2.&nbsp;&nbsp;These financial statements and schedule are the responsibility of the Company&#x2019;s management.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our responsibility is to express an opinion on these financial statements and schedule based on our audits.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We conducted our audits in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States).&nbsp;&nbsp;Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is not required to have, nor were we engaged to perform, an audit of its internal control over financial reporting.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our audits included consideration of internal control over financial reporting as a basis for designing audit procedures that are appropriate in the circumstances, but not for the purpose of expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting. Accordingly, we express no such opinion.&nbsp;&nbsp;An audit also includes examining, on a test basis, evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial statements, assessing the accounting principles used and significant estimates made by management, as well as evaluating the overall presentation of the financial statements and schedule.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that our audits provide a reasonable basis for our opinion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In our opinion, the consolidated financial statements referred to above present fairly, in all material respects, the consolidated financial position of BroadVision, Inc. as of December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and the consolidated results of its operations and its cash flows for each of the two years in the period ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, in conformity with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles.&nbsp; Also, in our opinion, the financial statement schedule, when considered in relation to the basic consolidated financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly, in all material respects, the information set forth therein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.70%;BORDER-TOP:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:15.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BROADVISION,&nbsp;INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_NOTES_TO_FINANCIAL_STATEMENT>
<A NAME="FIS_NOTES_TO_FINANCIAL_STATEMENT"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note&nbsp;1---Organization and Summary of Significant Accounting Policies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;Nature of Business
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	BroadVision,&nbsp;Inc. (collectively with its subsidiaries, "BroadVision" or "we") was incorporated in the state of Delaware on May&nbsp;13, 1993 and has been a publicly traded corporation since 1996. We develop, market, and support enterprise portal applications that enable companies to unify their e-business infrastructure and conduct both interactions and transactions with employees, partners, and customers through a personalized self-service model that increases revenues, reduces costs, and improves productivity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;Principles of Consolidation&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The accompanying Consolidated Financial Statements include our and our subsidiaries&#x2019; accounts. All significant intercompany accounts and transactions have been eliminated in consolidation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;Use of Estimates&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The preparation of Consolidated Financial Statements in conformity with U.S. GAAP requires management to make certain assumptions and estimates that affect reported amounts of assets and liabilities as of the date of the financial statements and the reported amounts of revenues and expenses during the reporting period. On an ongoing basis, we evaluate the reasonableness of our estimates, including those related to receivable reserves, stock-based compensation, investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	income taxes, as well as contingencies and litigation. We base our estimates on historical experience and on various other assumptions that we believe are reasonable, the results of which form the basis for making judgments about the carrying values of assets and liabilities that are not readily apparent from other sources. Actual results may differ from these estimates using different assumptions or conditions. We believe the following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	significant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	accounting policies reflect the more significant judgments and estimates used in the preparation of our Consolidated Financial Statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our revenue consists of fees for licenses of our software products, maintenance, consulting services and training.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Our revenue recognition policies comply with Accounting Standards Codification ASC 985-605,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software: Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and Staff Accounting Bulletin SAB 104,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Revenue Recognition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. In October 2009, the FASB amended the accounting standards in Accounting Standards Update ("ASU") 2009-13 (an update to ASC 605-25) ("ASU 2009-13") for certain multiple deliverable revenue arrangements to: 1) provide updated guidance on whether multiple deliverables exist, how the deliverables in an arrangement should be separated, and how the consideration should be allocated; 2) require an entity to allocate revenue in an arrangement using best estimated selling price ("BESP") of deliverables if a vendor does not have VSOE of selling price or third-party evidence ("TPE") of selling price; and 3) eliminate the use of the residual method and require an entity to allocate revenue using the relative selling price method. We adopted ASU 2009-13 at the beginning of the first quarter of fiscal 2011. The application of these new accounting standards did not have a material impact on total net revenues for fiscal year 2011.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We recognize revenue when all four of the following revenue recognition criteria have been met:

	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We qualify the second of the above listed criteria differently for different types of revenues, as follows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Software License Revenue, Non-Subscription and Non-Hosted Products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Delivery of non-subscription and non-hosted software products is considered to have occurred when title to the physical media and risk of loss have been transferred to the customer, which generally occurs when media containing the licensed programs is provided to a common carrier. In case of electronic delivery, delivery occurs when the customer is given access to the licensed programs. For products that cannot be used without a licensing key, the delivery requirement is met when the licensing key is made available to the
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
